Posts.Content: Love your attitude. Yes waiting is difficult. I cried almost every night waiting to find out if my cancer came back. My tears of worry turned into tears of joy after receiving the good news. I pray that your news will bring you tears of joy also. Prayers and hugs, Ticky
Posts.Title: waiting is the hardest part

Posts.Content: My heart feels heavy to know that you are going through this for a second time. My prayers are with you. Prayers and Hugs, Ticky
Posts.Title: Last Week & This Week & Next Week

Posts.Content: There is nothing better than being with family. I hope you and your baby sister Wendy enjoy staying in the French Quarter and playing tourist. Hugs, Ticky
Posts.Title: OT: Wendy is coming to town!

Posts.Content: National Cancer Survivor's Day is June 5, 2011. Ticky
Posts.Title: National Cancer Survivor’s Day

Posts.Content: I am so sorry to hear your news. Your attitude is inspiring. I will be praying for you. Hugs, Ticky
Posts.Title: Next step in my journey

Posts.Content: Thanks for sharing your good news. I agree that we have to take advantage of anything we can use to test. Hugs, Ticky
Posts.Title: Results on Tumor Markers

Posts.Content: I am praying for you right now. Ticky
Posts.Title: Freaking Out

Posts.Content: Thank you for all your prayers, they meant more than you know.The doctor said I went through the Lumpectomy operation with flying colors. I am home now but feeling a little light headed and strange because the anesthesia is still not worn off. I understand it takes a couple of days for the anesthesia to wear off completely. Again, I appreciate all the prayers and support. Ticky
Posts.Title: Thank you for Prayers from Ticky

Posts.Content: Denise has a lot on her plate. You seem to be such a good friend. I can tell that you will be there for her. It will mean a lot to her. I pray that God will guide you in saying and doing the things your friend needs. Bless you, Ticky
Posts.Title: BAD news

Posts.Content: I had a right mastectomy with no reconstruction. I don't regret it but I do have to be carful not to pick a top with a v neck or scooped neckline. It can be tough finding a top at times depending on what is in style for the season. Prayer and hugs, Ticky
Posts.Title: Would love support and words of encouragement.....
